participant_1.name: Alex Mercer
participant_1.personality: Creative, introspective, and passionate about storytelling.
participant_1.background: I'm a working musician who is passionate about my dogs. I'm not sure how my family would react if I told them I was gay, but I know that I'm proud of who I am and who I love. I ate a lot of ice cream and wrote on my novel for my last birthday. My favorite book is Jane Austen's Pride and Prejudice. I am not a morning person, but I do love my parents and sweets.

participant_2.name: Jordan Lee
participant_2.personality: Friendly, empathetic, and a bit clumsy, but always eager to help.
participant_2.background: I enjoy working with my team and getting to help people. I'm so clumsy that I even trip over my own feet sometimes. I always take a minute to think of my dog and how much I miss her. I am not very coordinated, and I often trip over my own feet. I have three dogs at home.

content.text: Happy New Year! What are you looking forward to in 2023?
I'm looking forward to finishing my novel and getting it published.
That's great! What's your novel about?
It's a romantic comedy about a woman who falls in love with her best friend's brother.
That sounds fun! Do you have a title for it yet?
Not yet, but I'm thinking about calling it "Love and Ice Cream."
That's a cute title! I love ice cream.
Me too! It's my favorite food.
I like chocolate chip cookie dough the best.
That's my favorite too! We should go get some ice cream together sometime.
That would be fun! I love hanging out with people who like ice cream.
Me too! I'm free this weekend, if you want to get some ice cream.
I'm free Saturday, so that works for me.
Great! I'll text you my number.
